title: Pavlos Fyssas
summary: Pavlos Fyssas (Greek: Παύλος Φύσσας; 10 April 1979 – 17 September 2013), also known by his stage name Killah P (meaning "Killer of the Past"), was a Greek rapper, notable for his participation and performance in musical projects, as well as for his anti-fascist activism. He toured well-known venues in Athens and throughout Greece. He was murdered on 17 September 2013 by a member of the neo-fascist group Golden Dawn.
